channel.title: Walking on YOUR DAILY LIMERICK
channel.description: Recent content in Walking on limericks.dailyonthis.site

item.description: An architect out for a walk, Heaving a heavy sigh, he did balk. A sketchbook he brought, His projects he thought, And sketched with a pencil …
A housewife went for a stroll one day, Her mission to make her house sparkle and stay. She hummed and she walked, But she was sadly stalked …
A translator was out for a stroll, Admiring the sights on his stroll, When all of a sudden, He spoke in a muddle, Confusing his English and …
A poet was taking a stroll, Admiring the sunset and sky, Whilst on his walk he composed a poem, And felt his soul begin to fly. He wrote of …
A tour guide on a walking spree, Took sightseers around so they could see, The beauty and grace, Every place and space, Making sure all had …
A medical man walking around, Curious to see what he’d found. A clinic in sight, A trip so bright, A true medical wonder abound.
A businessman on the street, was determined to get his feet to keep on walking, not just talking and he kept a swift pace, so fleet!
There was a young waiter so bold, As he walked he was sure to unfold A happy demeanor And kindly demeanor As he walked down the street so …
A dancer out walking one day Caught sight of a street full of play He skipped and he hopped Then nonstop he moped For a dance he was longing …

There was a doctor out walking, As he perused the town square, His stroll was so soothing, In the air was a bearing, That with each step, …
A daring pilot named Clyde Was walking quite bravely outside When he saw a plane He couldn’t restrain His need for adventure to ride!

A graceful dancer was walking, An enviable stride she was flocking, Her feet moved so light, Her grace was a sight, Her walk a true wonder …
